p: Administration of 2000 mg/kg of the Croton macrostachyus crude extract and solvent fractions did not produce any sign of toxicity. The crude extract and solvent fractions did not cause changes like breathing, alertness, motor activity, restlessness, diarrhea, coma, convulsions, and appearance in the two weeks of follow-up period. Therefore, the LD50 can be considered as higher than 2000 mg/kg.
